tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE rentals (
    rental_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    rental_date DATE,
    return_date DATE,
    rented_by VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE RentalDetails (
  rental_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id INT,
  renter_id INT,
  rent_start_date DATE,
  rent_end_date DATE
);
